Plot: In downtown Manhattan, a gruesome discovery has just been made-an underground charnel house containing the bones of dozens of murder victims. Research reveals that a serial killer was at work in New York's notorious Five Points neighborhood in the 1880s, bent on prolonging his lifespan by any means. When a newspaper story on the old murders appears to ignite a new series of horrifyingly similar killings, panic overtakes New York City. Now, FBI agent Pendergast, journalist Bill Smithback, and archaeologist Nora Kelly join forces to protect themselves from a vicious killer...before they become the next victims.
Characters: Aloysius X.L. Pendergast, Constance Greene, Nora Kelly, William Smithback, Cornelia Delamere Pendergast, Roger Brisbane, Anthony Fairhaven, Reinhart Puck, Oscar Gibbs, Patrick Murphy O'Shaughnessy, Bryce Harriman
Setting: New York State (United States), New York City, New York (United States)
